TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TraceContextEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class TraceContextEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class TraceContextEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 向所有处理 事件的方法提供跟踪记录的集合。

span.span: Provides a collection of trace records to any method that handles the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类 用于在 HTTP 请求处理过程中收集所有跟踪信息后，提供对跟踪记录的访问。The class is used by the class to provide access to trace records after all the tracing information is gathered during HTTP request processing. 通过添加事件处理程序委托来处理 事件，你可以处理这些记录，将它们记录到你自己的数据存储，或者将其作为输入提供给分析工具。By adding an event handler delegate to handle the event, you can process the records, record them to your own data store, or provide them as input to a profiling tool. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何注册 委托来处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a delegate to handle the event. 在此示例中， `OnTraceFinished` 方法 通过属性访问对象的集合 ，循环访问它们，并将它们写入响应流。In this example, the `OnTraceFinished` method accesses the collection of objects through the property, iterates through them, and writes them to the response stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]

param.name: records
param.span: 对象的集合，表示当前请求的所有跟踪记录。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent all the trace records logged for the current request.

summary.span: 使用提供的跟踪记录集合来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the provided collection of trace records.

summary.span: 获取与当前请求关联的 消息的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of messages that are associated with the current request.

value.span: 与当前请求关联的跟踪记录的集合。

span.span: A collection of trace records that are associated with the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对和方法的每次调用 都会生成一个 添加到 消息集合的对象。Every call to the and methods generates a object that is added to the messages collection. 方法调用将属性设置 为 `true` ，而另一个方法调用将其设置为 `false` 。The method call sets the property to `true`, while the other method calls set it to `false`. 您可以循环访问 消息，并检查具有特定类别或消息的记录，以及它们是否是警告。You can iterate through the messages and examine records with specific categories or messages, and whether they are warnings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何注册 委托来处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a delegate to handle the event. 在此示例中， `OnTraceFinished` 方法 通过属性访问对象的集合 ，循环访问它们，并将它们写入响应流。In this example, the `OnTraceFinished` method accesses the collection of objects through the property, iterates through them, and writes them to the response stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]
